description:
See http://docs.rackspacecloud.com/servers/api/cs-bindguide-latest.pdf page 10 and 11.  Need to support Last Modified header and changes-since queryparam.

This may not need to be its own bug, but I'm going from top to bottom in the dev guide and don't want to forget it.
title: Support efficient polling in API

comments.content:
See http://docs.rackspacecloud.com/servers/api/cs-bindguide-latest.pdf page 10 and 11.  Need to support Last Modified header and changes-since queryparam.

This may not need to be its own bug, but I'm going from top to bottom in the dev guide and don't want to forget it.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~gundlach
